title: Survival Horror Music Bundle
description: Frightening scores for the next great Horror Game. All music is royalty free, and created by a team of music industry veterans, world class songwriters, and Grammy Winning mix engineers!
longDescription:
Soundstripe's Award Winning Music is Perfect For:


  • Action Horror Games
  • Survival Horror Games

  • Psychological horror Games


LISTEN TO ALL THE SONGS HERE


Music

The music in this bundle includes a wide variety of music including 44 songs from 20 different artists. You can listen to all of the songs in this bundle here.

Royalty Free!

Royalty free music is hands-down the best option for any individual needing access quality music that is being legally attained. When you license through a royalty free media company, that company pays the song's creator(s) so you don't have to. This saves you money in the long run. If you need more convincing, this blog post is another resource worth checking out.


Why Soundstripe?

Our extensive catalog spans multiple genres, ensuring that you'll find the perfect soundtrack for your project. And with Soundstripe's trusted reputation in the industry, backed by certifications from platforms like Twitch, you can trust that you're getting high-quality audio assets that enhance rather than detract from your work. We have a team of music industry veterans, world class songwriters, and Grammy Winning mix engineers ensuring that all of our songs are created to the highest standards possible. Don't let your creative vision be limited by subpar audio – elevate it with Soundstripe bundles on Unreal Engine today!
technicalDetails:
• 44 High Quality Tracks
  • 802 MB
  • All songs are in WAV format.
  • Tracks are 16-bit/44.1 kHz
  • All songs are at a lossless resolution.
  • Every song in this bundle is Royalty Free!
